thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: FAIL!!!!
thread.title_full: FAIL!!!! - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rrivers81
title: FAIL!!!!
text: I booked through booking.com , I called the hotel directly to make sure they had my reservation for 3 rooms, they said "of course" I show up at 1am with 2 kids and grandparents, they canceled my rooms. They claim the cc was declined. No one tried to call me or email me. We had to search NYC for 3 rooms on a Saturday night with no help from Hilton. FAIL ON YOUR PART HILTON!! But of course my cc was charged anyway, the one that was declined..Magic I guess...
